General.Name: Tanco Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Tanco Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development/Management, Resorts and Club Operation/Management, and Construction segments. It invests, develops, constructs, and manages properties; operates and manages resorts, and golf and marina clubs; operates vacation ownership interval and point based schemes; provides travel and tour agency services; and acts as a general agent. The company is also involved in contracting and building works; general trading; and money lending business, as well as in the provision of consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Jeram Kuantan (Malaya) Berhad and changed its name to Tanco Holdings Berhad in June 1997. Tanco Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1958 and is based in Puchong, Malaysia.
